00017 // EARS
00018 #include "AssociationFramework.hpp"
00019 #include "AssociationModel.hpp"
00020 #include "Logger.hpp"
00021 #include "Model1.hpp"
00022 #include "Model2.hpp"
00023 #include "OutputWriter.hpp"
00024 
00025 // Lemur
00026 #include "IndexManager.hpp"
00027 #include "Param.hpp"
00028 
00029 
00031 void 
00032 ears::AssociationFramework::run( std::string task )
00033 {
00034   //
00035   // load parameters
00036   //
00037   if ( task != "ef" && task != "ep" ) {
00038     LOG( logERROR ) << "unsupported task: '" << task << "'";
00039     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00040   }  
00041   
00042   std::string modelname = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "model" );
00043   if ( modelname.length() == 0 ) {
00044     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'model' is not set";
00045     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00046   }
00047   if ( modelname != "1" && modelname != "2" ) {
00048     LOG( logERROR ) << "Unknown model '" << modelname << "'. Valid values: 1 or 2";
00049     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );            
00050   }
00051   
00052   // init stat collector
00053   stat_ = new Stat();
00054   
00055   //
00056   // load index
00057   //
00058   std::string indexFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "index" );
00059   if ( indexFile.length() == 0 ) {
00060     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'index' is not set";
00061     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00062   }
00063   LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading index '" << indexFile << "'";
00064   try {    
00065     index_ = lemur::api::IndexManager::openIndex( indexFile );    
00066   }
00067   catch ( const lemur::api::Exception& e ) {
00068     LOG( logERROR ) << "Can't open index, check parameter index";
00069     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00070   }      
00071   LOG( logDEBUG ) << index_->docCount() << " documents";
00072 
00073   //
00074   // load associations; note that they depend on the model
00075   // 
00076   if ( modelname == "1" )   
00077     entities_ = new EntityRep( EntityRep::aiENTITY );
00078   if ( modelname == "2" )
00079     entities_ = new EntityRep( EntityRep::aiDOCUMENT );
00080   entities_->loadAssociations( *index_ );
00081   
00082   //
00083   // load queries
00084   //
00085   queries_ = new QueryRep();
00086   queries_->loadQueries( *index_ );
00087   
00088   //
00089   // Run model, i.e,. calculate p(q|e) for all queries and entities
00090   //
00091   AssociationModel* model;
00092   if ( modelname == "1" ) 
00093     model = new Model1( *index_, *entities_, *queries_, *stat_ );
00094   if ( modelname == "2" )
00095     model = new Model2( *index_, *entities_, *queries_, *stat_ );
00096   model->init();
00097   ASSOCRES_T pqe = model->scoreAll();  
00098   delete model;
00099 
00100   //
00101   // write output
00102   //
00103   OutputWriter* output = new OutputWriter( *entities_, *queries_ );
00104   output->outputAssocRes( task, pqe );
00105   delete output;
00106 
00107   //
00108   // output collected statistics (only in debug mode)
00109   //
00110   stat_->outputStat();
00111   
00112   //
00113   // clean up
00114   //
00115   pqe.clear();
00116   delete entities_;
00117   delete queries_;
00118   delete index_;  
00119   
00120   LOG( logINFO ) << "Over and out";
00121 }
